name: Eiffel Tower
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars, a global cultural icon of France.

name: Louvre Museum
description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, France.

name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
description: A medieval Catholic cathedral known for its Gothic architecture and rich history.

name: Mount Fuji
description: An active volcano and the tallest peak in Japan, popular for hiking and sightseeing.

name: Tokyo Tower
description: A communications and observation tower inspired by the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

name: Meiji Shrine
description: A Shinto shrine dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken, located in a serene forest.

name: Central Park
description: A large public park in New York City, offering walking paths, lakes, and open spaces.

name: Times Square
description: A bustling commercial and entertainment hub known for its bright lights and billboards.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, located on Liberty Island.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: An iconic performing arts venue with distinctive sail-shaped architecture.

name: Bondi Beach
description: A popular beach known for surfing, sunbathing, and coastal walks.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A series of fortifications built to protect ancient China from invaders.

name: Forbidden City
description: A palace complex in central Beijing that served as the home of emperors.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient amphitheater that hosted gladiator fights and public spectacles.

name: Vatican Museums
description: A collection of art and historical museums located within Vatican City.

name: Santorini Beaches
description: Famous for its black and red sand beaches, ideal for relaxation and swimming.

name: Oia Village
description: A picturesque village known for its whitewashed houses and sunsets.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A colossal statue of Jesus Christ overlooking the city of Rio.

name: Copacabana Beach
description: A vibrant beach known for its lively atmosphere and beautiful coastline.

name: Table Mountain
description: A flat-topped mountain offering panoramic views of Cape Town.

name: Cape Point
description: A scenic promontory at the southern tip of the Cape Peninsula.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive canyon carved by the Colorado River, offering breathtaking views.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A set of massive waterfalls located on the border between the U.S. and Canada.

name: Banff National Park
description: A beautiful national park in the Canadian Rockies, known for its lakes and wildlife.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Ancient pyramids that are among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: The British Museum
description: A public institution dedicated to human history, art, and culture.

name: Big Ben
description: The nickname for the Great Bell of the clock at the north end of the Palace of Westminster.

name: Burj Khalifa
description: The tallest building in the world, offering observation decks with panoramic views.

name: Dubai Mall
description: The world's largest shopping mall, featuring an aquarium, ice rink, and many shops.
